title: Chelsea Football Club is delighted to announce the appointment of Enzo Maresca as new head coach of the men’s team.
snippet: Chelsea Football Club is delighted to announce the appointment of Enzo Maresca as new head coach of the men’s team.

title: Chelsea appoint Enzo Maresca as head coach
snippet: Italian signs five-year deal as he leaves Leicester City to replace Mauricio Pochettino at Stamford Bridge · Chelsea have announced the appointment of Enzo Maresca as their new head coach.

title: How and why Chelsea hired Enzo Maresca – and the seven things they were looking for - The Athletic
snippet: Chelsea’s search is over: Enzo Maresca is now officially the fourth permanent head coach to be employed by the Clearlake Capital-Todd Boehly consortium in the space of two years.

title: Enzo Maresca: Chelsea appoint Leicester City boss as new manager on five-year deal - BBC Sport
snippet: Chelsea appoint Leicester City manager Enzo Maresca on a five-year contract with the option of an extra year.

title: ‘A dream’: Enzo Maresca appointed Chelsea head coach on five-year deal | Chelsea | The Guardian
snippet: The 44‑year‑old ­Italian led Leicester to the Championship title last season – his only full campaign as a head coach – and he succeeds ­Mauricio ­Pochettino, who left ­Chelsea by mutual consent two weeks ago. Maresca becomes the fifth mana­ger in the two-year Chelsea ownership of Behdad Eghbali and Todd ­Boehly, after Thomas Tuchel, Graham Potter, Frank Lampard and ­Pochettino.
